tool_description: User Reviews and Recommendations of Best Restaurants, Shopping, Nightlife, Food, Entertainment, Things to Do, Services and More at Yelp. This is a Community Listing for the Yelp GraphQL API.
name: Yelp GraphQL
title: Yelp GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.description: Edit Variable values to ensure a successful API response & customize your request. Example queries can be found in the [About](https://rapidapi.com/rapidapi/api/yelp-graphql1/details) page!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yelp-graphql1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yelp-graphql1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yelp-graphql1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yelp-graphql1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
